Question 150) A pool conservation company uses a water treatment product whose technical specifications suggest that 1.5 ml of this product be added for every 1,000 l of pool water. This company was hired to take care of a rectangular pool of constant depth equal to 1.7 m, with width and length equal to 3 m and 5 m, respectively. The level of the water blade of this pool is kept 50 cm from the pool edge.
The amount of this product, in millilitro, that should be added to this pool to meet its technical specifications is
A) 11.25.
B) 27.00.
C) 28.80.
D) 32.25.
E) 49.50.
